file_content.text: You dare seek control over the Dread Masters?
Abominations, all of you... choking the skies....
Fear.
The darkness... growing, drowning!
None can contain us. Not this prison, not the Republic and certainly not these creatures.
It's a privilege to finally meet the Dread Masters.
I'm honored, my lords.
Of course.
You'd still be the Esh-kha's playthings if not for me.
You just were contained.
Fear!
We are the Dread Masters. Show your respect.
I didn't mean any insult, my lords. Forgive me.
I apologize.
Do not tempt our wrath again.
You cannot scare me!
Impossible.
You are strong with the dark side.
I can't take it anymore. Please--I give up!
Make it stop!
The weak surrender quickly.
I thought you were supposed to be scary. I'm barely breaking a sweat.
That the best you can do?
Lovely.
Aaaaah!
Enough.
Releasing us from the Esh-kha's grip warrants some degree of mercy.
Don't ignore me.
We are aware of your presence.
The dark side is strong with you. But you are in the presence of true power now.
Today you join an elite circle of Imperials--those who have faced terror and survived.
Your resolve is strong, hunter. Few brave our company. Even fewer maintain their sanity.
Fear is natural in our presence. But you helped us. For that, we will spare you true terror.
In here, men! Take down the Imperials, secure the Dread....
Warden Graal. How nice to see you.
That lump in your throat? It's panic. Think on what will happen next.
Show the Republic the true meaning of terror.
Kill them all.
First the pupils dilate, muscles tighten, hysteria replaces rationality, and then....
Aaaaargh!
...the mind shatters.
I see why the Empire fought so hard to free you.
Impressive.
I'd be honored to learn the art of terror.
Can you teach me your methods?
First help us escape this wretched planet. Then, perhaps, we can talk.
I'd hate to see the Republic use that kind of power.
I'm glad you're on our side.
Aaaaargh!
They're scared enough already.
Let them run away.
Go! Spread word that the Dread Masters are free!
Come on, men. Retreat!
We have been gone. Do we now show mercy to the Republic?
They report your release, panic spreads across the galaxy. All according to plan.
They will fan the fear.
Belsavis is crawling with threats. They aren't one of them.
Ignore them.
It's not safe down here. Let's get you back in Imperial territory.
Time to get moving.
Commander Calum--the Dread Masters are ready for extraction.
I knew you wouldn't fail us, my lord.
You never disappoint, agent.
Incredible work. Consider your contract fulfilled, hunter.
The Emperor will be most pleased.
I am Commander Calum, my lords. It's my honor to ensure your safe passage off Belsavis. An evacuation team awaits you in minimum security.
Good. The trip will give us a chance to stretch our legs, and to terrorize the Republic.
Good. We'll strike out at once. But first, we terrorize the Esh-kha.
You have much skill. Learn from what you've seen today. May it fuel your power.
You have earned our favor, agent. Intelligence is most fortunate.
You have served the Empire well, mercenary. We are truly impressed.
You have earned our favor. We thank you.
The Dread Masters aren't known for compliments, but I agree with their assessment.
All that remains is your debriefing. I will await your company aboard the space station. Commander Calum out.
Retreat! Retreat!
Blasters ready, men! Down the Imps and capture the Dread....
More guests. Splendid.
Ah!
I bow to no one. [Resist]
